entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
